climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard products are made with at least 50% recycled content and meet social, environmental, and chemical requirements.

features: Less Noise: The wireless USB keyboard adopts scissors structure button, reducing 90% of the clicking noise. Silent click wireless mouse will allow you to do your job without disturbing others.
Compact Size: The wireless keyboard is in compact size design with number pad, saving the space on your desk.The mouse is ambidextrous to fit in both left and right hands.

Easy to Use: LeadsaiL wireless keyboard features 12 multimedia shortcuts allowing instant access to play, pause, previous, next, volume, mute and more. (Note: this function is not compatible with Mac OS).

Energy Saving: The wireless keyboard and mouse combo will go into sleeping mode to save battery consumption while it’s not in use for 3mins. Click or press any key or button to wake them up. (1*AA battery for the mouse and 2*AA batteries for the keyboard, Battery not included in the package)

Plug and Play: The wireless mouse and keyboard set shares a 2-in-1 USB receiver that is placed inside the mouse next to the battery compartment. The 2.4G wireless connection can be up to 10 meters(33 ft) away.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Leadsail wireless keyboard and mouse combo is widely compatible with Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10, Mac and other operating systems, works with PC, laptops, desktops and more.A tilt angle for the great typing experience, contoured shape of the ambidextrous mouse would provide hours of work comfortably

Auto sleeping function extend the battery when the wireless keyboard is out of use for 15mins.Scissors switch constructions offers faster typing respond and more comfortable typing experience and reduce typing noise.Silent mouse will never disturb others while clicking .

The on/off switches and intelligent auto sleeping mode for energy saving.2-in-1 USB receiver(inside the mouse next to the battery compartment). The 2.4G wireless connection can be up to 10 meters(33 ft) away.LED indicator on the right upper corner includes Caps Lock/Num Lock/Battery indicator

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: For the most part, I'm quiet surprised how responsive the keyboard has been. no lag what so ever. quality is definitely on the lower end with 100% of the keyboard being plastic, but even so, its very well made, with very comfortable keys and I would definitely recommend it over other cheap keyboards from Walmart..not to mention it comes with a wireless mouse as well. it would of been nice if it came with batteries, but other than that this is an A grade product for what your paying for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft touch , types so easily, looks great :)
reviews.reviewText: As most people, I have gone through many keyboards. ( the last one a victim of spilled coffee..) I have had some that I chose for color. The color was good but poor in the functionality. This keyboard and mouse are modern with look and function. The soft touch and the flow of typing is fantastic! The mouse is slim and comfortable. I give it a 5 star !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i have used this keyboard and mouse since jan 2022. it just randomly stopped working a few days ago. i wish i would have gotten more than 2 years of use but i would say for the price this was a pretty decent keyboard, it was a good run. got a lot of work done using these bad boys. only other complaint i have is that the backspace button is pretty small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A really great keyboard and mouse combo
reviews.reviewText: Really great product and the connection to Bluetooth is quite strong. Only problem I had was 3 keys popping off, one broke completely but it was a key I never use, so it was not end of the world. The plus key still does not stay down but it has not really affected my productivity. The right button of the mouse became a little mushy and does not click anymore but it still does the job. Definitely a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY! Half of the keyboard didn't work. Mouse censor started lagging 2 days into use.
reviews.reviewText: First of all, everybody who left a comment saying the usb receiver didnt come with it need to know that the receiver is inside the mouse, open the place where you put the batteries and you will see it in there for you to pull out.Now, the first day of using the keyboard the left side had no functionality. I saw that the keys only worked on that side if lifted it up in and held it in an angle while typing with my other hand. This is particularly annoying because the only reason I bought it was to replace my old wireless keyboard which started having a similar issue (ironically I am typing this review now with my old keyboard).Then after a few days I noticed the mouse looked like it was lagging and lacking proper response time. Thought maybe it was my computer and maybe it had a virus, BUT NOPE! I switched back to my old wireless mouse and everything was smooth and even in motion.Overall, if your like me who wanted to just get a cheap $20 wireless mouse and keyboard, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. Cough up another $10-$15 dollars and get yourself something that will at least last longer than a few days lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this combo unit
reviews.reviewText: I love the size of this combo keyboard / mouse. The keyboard and mouse have a nice tactile feel ( but not noisy). Put the USB transmitter in, put a battery in keyboard and mouse, and you are good to go. I like the smaller light keyboard as i have my pc connected to my tv and use it a lot in bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for the long haul
reviews.reviewText: I have had this product since May, 2023. Over time it has gradually lost functionality. Instead of using my mouse or keyboard to wake the computer up, I first have to unplug the dongle, remove the mouse battery, plug it back in and put the battery back in in order to get the mouse and keyboard to wake up. It has now progressed to skipping letters when I type or entering double letters (I have to now type slower to prevent this from happening) and the mouse lags and skips all over the screen unless I have it set to the slowest setting. As the months go on, this mouse/keyboard set has become more of a frustration than a tool, so much that I have finally bit the bullet and ordered a new (hopefully better) one that has a 24 month warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
